text: Nazario Pardini (25 February 1937, Arena Metato, frazione of San Giuliano Terme) is an Italian journalist, essayist, and poet. == Biography == He graduated in Comparative literature and also in Philosophy at Pisa University and he is also a blogger. Pardini is respected in Italian literary circles for both his creative output and his critical contributions to contemporary poetry and literature. He published many poems and literary criticism books. Among othersː Dicotomie (2013), I canti dell'assenza (2015), Di mare e di vita (2017), Nel frattempo viviamo (2020). == Honours and awards == * Premio Micheloni, Sirio Guerrieri in La Spezia * Premio CinqueTerre in Portovenere * Premio Portus Lunae in La Spezia * Premio Città di Pontremoli in Pontremoli * Premio Le Regioni in Pisa * Premio alla carriera poetica, 1° Premio Ponte Vecchio, in Florence, 2014/2015 * Apollinari Diplome awarded from Facoltà di Scienze della Comunicazione Sociale of Salesian Pontifical University * Premio Le Muse in Florence * Premio Mario Tobino in Vezzano Ligure ==References== == Other websites == * Alla volta di Leucade Category:1937 births Category:Italian essayists Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian poets Category:Writers from Tuscany
